thread.title: Hannity: Liberal Media Thinks Name-Calling Is A One-Way Street
thread.title_full: Hannity: Liberal Media Thinks Name-Calling Is A One-Way Street

author: Jack Davis
title: Hannity: Liberal Media Thinks Name-Calling Is A One-Way Street
text:
Hannity: Liberal Media Thinks Name-Calling Is A One-Way Street "Let's not forget ..." Share on Facebook Share Tweet Email Email Print Advertisement - story continues below 
As mainstream media outlets complain about the treatment they’ve received from President Donald Trump, Sean Hannity said it’s time the media’s language against Trump gets the scrutiny it deserves. 
Although the media and Trump have battled throughout Trump’s candidacy and presidency, his tweet last week branding the mainstream media the enemy of the American people has launched a push-back from the media. 
“Whiny members of the mainstream media … they’re complaining that the president’s words could actually lead to physical violence against them,” the Fox News host said on his Tuesday night show. Advertisement - story continues below CIA Analyst Who Bashed Trump Donated To Clinton’s Campaign 
Hannity turned that perspective around. 
“Will the president get hurt when you call him a dictator, a liar, racist, sexist, misogynist, homophone, xenophobe. Is that the same thing?” he asked. Advertisement – story continues below 
Invoking CNN’s Chris Cuomo as an example, Hannity said liberal media personalities “lecture us about public discourse and the incitement of violence. Where was my friend Chris when his colleague Van Jones called Trump’s victory a ‘whitelash,’ insinuating all his supporters are racist?” 
Hannity noted that the liberal media’s concern is only for itself. 
“Let’s not forget about the lack of concern from Cuomo and others in the media when President Trump was likened to the world’s most evil dictator,” Hannity noted. Advertisement - story continues below 
“Question: If you call the President a Nazi, or compare him to Hitler, are you inciting violence against him?” 
Hannity then brought his argument to its conclusion. 
“To the whiny crybaby snowflakes in the liberal alt-left media that are worried about their safety, how about you lead by example and maybe stop calling the president and comparing him to Hitler?” 
Hannity’s Tuesday criticism of the media followed previous comments noting that the media has simply continued in campaign mode. 
“These left-wing news outlets thought they’d be able to stop Donald Trump from becoming president but now, instead of admitting they were wrong, they have now doubled down on their attacks against President Trump,” he wrote in a Fox News opinion column. 
“The news media are at war with the president because their little egos are bruised, and they have been exposed. And they’re waging this battle by focusing in on superfluous issues, citing unnamed sources. They are basically throwing around allegations in the hope something may stick one day, and they go out there and report breathlessly about whatever the tweet is of the day,” he added. What do you think? Scroll down to comment below. Advertisement Popular Right Now
